languages.text: На коже заключенных виден некроз — кажется, несчастных пытали холодом.

traits.locale_text: [draft] На коже заключенных видны множества участков отмершей плоти, эти заключенных долго пытали холодом и недоеданием

languages.text: The captives' skin is ruined by necrosis: these wretched souls were probably tortured with cold.
languages.original_text: На коже заключенных виден некроз — кажется, несчастных пытали холодом.

traits.locale_text: The captives' skin is ruined by necrosis — these wretched souls were probably tortured with cold.
The captives' skin is ruined by necrosis — these wretched souls were probably tortured with cold.

The captives' skin is ruined by necrosis: these wretched souls were probably tortured with cold.
The captives' skin is ruined by necrosis: these wretched souls were probably tortured with cold.
The captives' skin is ruined by necrosis: these wretched souls were probably tortured with cold.

languages.text: 所有俘虏的皮肤上都布满了坏疽，这些可怜人临死前多半是遭到了酷寒的折磨。
languages.original_text: The captives' skin is ruined by necrosis: these wretched souls were probably tortured with cold.

traits.locale_text: 所有俘虏的皮肤上都布满了坏疽，这些可怜人临死前多半是遭到了酷寒的折磨。

languages.text: Die Haut der Gefangenen ist von der Nekrose zerfressen. Diese armen Seelen wurden wohl mit Kälte gefoltert.
languages.original_text: The captives' skin is ruined by necrosis: these wretched souls were probably tortured with cold.

traits.locale_text: Die Haut der Gefangenen ist von der Nekrose zerfressen. Diese armen Seelen wurden wohl mit Kälte gefoltert.

languages.text: La piel de los prisioneros está necrosada: seguramente se torturó a estos desgraciados con frío.
languages.original_text: The captives' skin is ruined by necrosis: these wretched souls were probably tortured with cold.

traits.locale_text: La piel de los prisioneros está necrosada: seguramente se torturó a estos desgraciados con frío.

languages.text: La peau des victimes est complètement nécrosée : ces pauvres hères ont sûrement été torturés par le froid.
languages.original_text: The captives' skin is ruined by necrosis: these wretched souls were probably tortured with cold.

traits.locale_text: La peau des victimes est complètement nécrosée : ces pauvres hères ont sûrement été torturés par le froid.

languages.text: 捕虜の皮膚は壊死しており、これらの惨めな魂はおそらく寒さで拷問されたのだろう。
languages.original_text: The captives' skin is ruined by necrosis: these wretched souls were probably tortured with cold.

traits.locale_text: 捕虜の皮膚は壊死しており、これらの惨めな魂はおそらく寒さで拷問されたのだろう。

languages.text: Tutsakların derisi, nekrozla perişan olmuş. Bu zavallılar, muhtemelen soğukta bırakılarak işkence görmüş.
languages.original_text: The captives' skin is ruined by necrosis: these wretched souls were probably tortured with cold.

traits.locale_text: Tutsakların derisi, nekrozla perişan olmuş. Bu zavallılar, muhtemelen soğuk işkencesi görmüş.
